Description.Name: Commandeering Command
Description.Details:
As you cut the connection to your last client, Yang bursts into the command center. He looks out of breath.

"There's a problem, Boss," he says, leaning on a nearby console to catch his breath.

"Go on," you instruct, quirking a brow.

He goes onto explain the dilemma - while, yes, your old command vehicle was still around, there's been no small amount of confusion on the ground. Records have been lost, found, copied wrong, lost again, copied from the copies, et cetera.

"So, the short of it is," Yang concludes, "they have an [[DM.MechDefs[vehicledef_AWACS],AWACS Command VTOL]] and an [[DM.MechDefs[vehicledef_MOBILEHQ_ACM],Oracle Mobile HQ truck]], but they don't know which one actually belongs to you. The way I see it, we can just pick the one we want and they'll be none the wiser!

Description.Name: CommanderGearLoot
Description.Details: "Well, I'm not about to look a gift VTOL in the mouth," you say. "Grab Sumire to load up the [[DM.MechDefs[vehicledef_AWACS],AWACS]] onto the Leopard and bring it back up the Argo." Yang nods and walks briskly out of the room on his way to the 'Mech Bay. You wait. A few seconds later he walks back through and out the other door in the direction of the bridge. He looks mortified that you saw the mistake, but says nothing as he now walks in the right direction to find Sumire. An hour or so later and you find yourself the proud owner of an AWACS Command VTOL.

Description.Name: CommanderGearLoot
Description.Details: "Well, I'm not about to look a gift [[DM.MechDefs[vehicledef_MOBILEHQ_ACM],Oracle]] in the mouth," you say. "Grab Sumire to load it up onto the Leopard and bring it back up the Argo." Yang nods and walks briskly out of the room on his way to the 'Mech Bay. You wait. A few seconds later he walks back through and out the other door in the direction of the bridge. He looks mortified that you saw the mistake, but says nothing as he now walks in the right direction to find Sumire. An hour or so later and you find yourself the proud owner of an Oracle Mobile HQ.
